description: Let NASA and the International Space Station help inform and entertain your child from the safety and comfort of your own home. Both are sharing a wealth of activities and experiments for kids of all ages.
title: NASA from home: Your child can become an astronaut and explore space
title_page: NASA from home: Your child can become an astronaut and explore space - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) After a few weeks of coronavirus quarantine, your home and backyard and even your neighborhood may feel a little smaller than it once did -- especially if you have children.
That's why it's time to look up into the sky.
Scientists from NASA and the International Space Station National Lab don't want your kids to fall behind because they're missing out on field trips to your local science museum, planetarium and other activities that can spark a love of science, technology, engineering or mathematics (STEM).
